00068 static const char* GPU_DATATYPE_STR[17] = {"", "float", "vec2", "vec3", "vec4",
00069     NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, "mat3", NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, "mat4"};
00070 
00071 /* GLSL code parsing for finding function definitions.
00072  * These are stored in a hash for lookup when creating a material. */
00073 
00074 static GHash *FUNCTION_HASH= NULL;
00075 /* static char *FUNCTION_PROTOTYPES= NULL;
00076  * static GPUShader *FUNCTION_LIB= NULL;*/
00077 
00078 static int gpu_str_prefix(const char *str, const char *prefix)
00079 {
00080     while (*str && *prefix) {
00081         if (*str != *prefix)
00082             return 0;
00083 
00084         str++;
00085         prefix++;
00086     }
00087     
00088     return (*prefix == '\0');
00089 }
00090 
00091 static char *gpu_str_skip_token(char *str, char *token, int max)
00092 {
00093     int len = 0;
00094 
00095     /* skip a variable/function name */
00096     while (*str) {
00097         if (ELEM7(*str, ' ', '(', ')', ',', '\t', '\n', '\r'))
00098             break;
00099         else {
00100             if (token && len < max-1) {
00101                 *token= *str;
00102                 token++;
00103                 len++;
00104             }
00105             str++;
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109     if (token)
00110         *token= '\0';
00111 
00112     /* skip the next special characters:
00113      * note the missing ')' */
00114     while (*str) {
00115         if (ELEM6(*str, ' ', '(', ',', '\t', '\n', '\r'))
00116             str++;
00117         else
00118             break;
00119     }
00120 
00121     return str;
00122 }
00123 
00124 static void gpu_parse_functions_string(GHash *hash, char *code)
00125 {
00126     GPUFunction *function;
00127     int i, type, qual;
00128 
00129     while ((code = strstr(code, "void "))) {
00130         function = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUFunction), "GPUFunction");
00131 
00132         code = gpu_str_skip_token(code, NULL, 0);
00133         code = gpu_str_skip_token(code, function->name, MAX_FUNCTION_NAME);
00134 
00135         /* get parameters */
00136         while (*code && *code != ')') {
00137             /* test if it's an input or output */
00138             qual = FUNCTION_QUAL_IN;
00139             if (gpu_str_prefix(code, "out "))
00140                 qual = FUNCTION_QUAL_OUT;
00141             if (gpu_str_prefix(code, "inout "))
00142                 qual = FUNCTION_QUAL_INOUT;
00143             if ((qual != FUNCTION_QUAL_IN) || gpu_str_prefix(code, "in "))
00144                 code = gpu_str_skip_token(code, NULL, 0);
00145 
00146             /* test for type */
00147             type= 0;
00148             for (i=1; i<=16; i++) {
00149                 if (GPU_DATATYPE_STR[i] && gpu_str_prefix(code, GPU_DATATYPE_STR[i])) {
00150                     type= i;
00151                     break;
00152                 }
00153             }
00154 
00155             if (!type && gpu_str_prefix(code, "sampler2DShadow"))
00156                 type= GPU_SHADOW2D;
00157             if (!type && gpu_str_prefix(code, "sampler2D"))
00158                 type= GPU_TEX2D;
00159 
00160             if (type) {
00161                 /* add paramater */
00162                 code = gpu_str_skip_token(code, NULL, 0);
00163                 code = gpu_str_skip_token(code, NULL, 0);
00164                 function->paramqual[function->totparam]= qual;
00165                 function->paramtype[function->totparam]= type;
00166                 function->totparam++;
00167             }
00168             else {
00169                 fprintf(stderr, "GPU invalid function parameter in %s.\n", function->name);
00170                 break;
00171             }
00172         }
00173 
00174         if (function->name[0] == '\0' || function->totparam == 0) {
00175             fprintf(stderr, "GPU functions parse error.\n");
00176             MEM_freeN(function);
00177             break;
00178         }
00179 
00180         BLI_ghash_insert(hash, function->name, function);
00181     }
00182 }

00185 static char *gpu_generate_function_prototyps(GHash *hash)
00186 {
00187     DynStr *ds = BLI_dynstr_new();
00188     GHashIterator *ghi;
00189     GPUFunction *function;
00190     char *name, *prototypes;
00191     int a;
00192     
00193     /* automatically generate function prototypes to add to the top of the
00194      * generated code, to avoid have to add the actual code & recompile all */
00195     ghi = BLI_ghashIterator_new(hash);
00196 
00197     for (; !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(ghi); BLI_ghashIterator_step(ghi)) {
00198         name = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(ghi);
00199         function = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(ghi);
00200 
00201         BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "void %s(", name);
00202         for (a=0; a<function->totparam; a++) {
00203             if (function->paramqual[a] == FUNCTION_QUAL_OUT)
00204                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "out ");
00205             else if (function->paramqual[a] == FUNCTION_QUAL_INOUT)
00206                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "inout ");
00207 
00208             if (function->paramtype[a] == GPU_TEX2D)
00209                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "sampler2D");
00210             else if (function->paramtype[a] == GPU_SHADOW2D)
00211                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "sampler2DShadow");
00212             else
00213                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, GPU_DATATYPE_STR[function->paramtype[a]]);
00214                 
00215             //BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, " param%d", a);
00216             
00217             if (a != function->totparam-1)
00218                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ", ");
00219         }
00220         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ");\n");
00221     }
00222 
00223     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "\n");
00224 
00225     prototypes = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(ds);
00226     BLI_dynstr_free(ds);
00227 
00228     return prototypes;
00229 }

00232 GPUFunction *GPU_lookup_function(const char *name)
00233 {
00234     if (!FUNCTION_HASH) {
00235         FUNCTION_HASH = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_strhash, BLI_ghashutil_strcmp, "GPU_lookup_function gh");
00236         gpu_parse_functions_string(FUNCTION_HASH, glsl_material_library);
00237         /*FUNCTION_PROTOTYPES = gpu_generate_function_prototyps(FUNCTION_HASH);
00238         FUNCTION_LIB = GPU_shader_create_lib(datatoc_gpu_shader_material_glsl);*/
00239     }
00240 
00241     return (GPUFunction*)BLI_ghash_lookup(FUNCTION_HASH, (void *)name);
00242 }

00246     GPU_code_generate_glsl_lib();

00249 void GPU_codegen_exit(void)
00250 {
00251     extern Material defmaterial;    // render module abuse...
00252 
00253     if (defmaterial.gpumaterial.first)
00254         GPU_material_free(&defmaterial);
00255 
00256     if (FUNCTION_HASH) {
00257         BLI_ghash_free(FUNCTION_HASH, NULL, (GHashValFreeFP)MEM_freeN);
00258         FUNCTION_HASH = NULL;
00259     }
00260 
00261     if (glsl_material_library) {
00262         MEM_freeN(glsl_material_library);
00263         glsl_material_library = NULL;
00264     }
00265 
00266     /*if (FUNCTION_PROTOTYPES) {
00267         MEM_freeN(FUNCTION_PROTOTYPES);
00268         FUNCTION_PROTOTYPES = NULL;
00269     }*/
00270     /*if (FUNCTION_LIB) {
00271         GPU_shader_free(FUNCTION_LIB);
00272         FUNCTION_LIB = NULL;
00273     }*/
00274 }

00278 static void codegen_convert_datatype(DynStr *ds, int from, int to, const char *tmp, int id)
00279 {
00280     char name[1024];
00281 
00282     BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s%d", tmp, id);
00283 
00284     if (from == to) {
00285         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, name);
00286     }
00287     else if (to == GPU_FLOAT) {
00288         if (from == GPU_VEC4)
00289             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "dot(%s.rgb, vec3(0.35, 0.45, 0.2))", name);
00290         else if (from == GPU_VEC3)
00291             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "dot(%s, vec3(0.33))", name);
00292         else if (from == GPU_VEC2)
00293             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "%s.r", name);
00294     }
00295     else if (to == GPU_VEC2) {
00296         if (from == GPU_VEC4)
00297             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec2(dot(%s.rgb, vec3(0.35, 0.45, 0.2)), %s.a)", name, name);
00298         else if (from == GPU_VEC3)
00299             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec2(dot(%s.rgb, vec3(0.33)), 1.0)", name);
00300         else if (from == GPU_FLOAT)
00301             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec2(%s, 1.0)", name);
00302     }
00303     else if (to == GPU_VEC3) {
00304         if (from == GPU_VEC4)
00305             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "%s.rgb", name);
00306         else if (from == GPU_VEC2)
00307             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec3(%s.r, %s.r, %s.r)", name, name, name);
00308         else if (from == GPU_FLOAT)
00309             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec3(%s, %s, %s)", name, name, name);
00310     }
00311     else {
00312         if (from == GPU_VEC3)
00313             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec4(%s, 1.0)", name);
00314         else if (from == GPU_VEC2)
00315             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec4(%s.r, %s.r, %s.r, %s.g)", name, name, name, name);
00316         else if (from == GPU_FLOAT)
00317             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "vec4(%s, %s, %s, 1.0)", name, name, name);
00318     }
00319 }
00320 
00321 static void codegen_print_datatype(DynStr *ds, int type, float *data)
00322 {
00323     int i;
00324 
00325     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "%s(", GPU_DATATYPE_STR[type]);
00326 
00327     for (i=0; i<type; i++) {
00328         BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "%f", data[i]);
00329         if (i == type-1)
00330             BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ")");
00331         else
00332             BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ", ");
00333     }
00334 }
00335 
00336 static int codegen_input_has_texture(GPUInput *input)
00337 {
00338     if (input->link)
00339         return 0;
00340     else if (input->ima)
00341         return 1;
00342     else
00343         return input->tex != NULL;
00344 }
00345 
00346 const char *GPU_builtin_name(GPUBuiltin builtin)
00347 {
00348     if (builtin == GPU_VIEW_MATRIX)
00349         return "unfviewmat";
00350     else if (builtin == GPU_OBJECT_MATRIX)
00351         return "unfobmat";
00352     else if (builtin == GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX)
00353         return "unfinvviewmat";
00354     else if (builtin == GPU_INVERSE_OBJECT_MATRIX)
00355         return "unfinvobmat";
00356     else if (builtin == GPU_VIEW_POSITION)
00357         return "varposition";
00358     else if (builtin == GPU_VIEW_NORMAL)
00359         return "varnormal";
00360     else if (builtin == GPU_OBCOLOR)
00361         return "unfobcolor";
00362     else if (builtin == GPU_AUTO_BUMPSCALE)
00363         return "unfobautobumpscale";
00364     else
00365         return "";
00366 }
00367 
00368 static void codegen_set_unique_ids(ListBase *nodes)
00369 {
00370     GHash *bindhash, *definehash;
00371     GPUNode *node;
00372     GPUInput *input;
00373     GPUOutput *output;
00374     int id = 1, texid = 0;
00375 
00376     bindhash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "codegen_set_unique_ids1 gh");
00377     definehash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "codegen_set_unique_ids2 gh");
00378 
00379     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next) {
00380         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next) {
00381             /* set id for unique names of uniform variables */
00382             input->id = id++;
00383             input->bindtex = 0;
00384             input->definetex = 0;
00385 
00386             /* set texid used for settings texture slot with multitexture */
00387             if (codegen_input_has_texture(input) &&
00388                 ((input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX) || (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX_PIXEL))) {
00389                 if (input->link) {
00390                     /* input is texture from buffer, assign only one texid per
00391                      * buffer to avoid sampling the same texture twice */
00392                     if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(bindhash, input->link)) {
00393                         input->texid = texid++;
00394                         input->bindtex = 1;
00395                         BLI_ghash_insert(bindhash, input->link, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(input->texid));
00396                     }
00397                     else
00398                         input->texid = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(bindhash, input->link));
00399                 }
00400                 else if (input->ima) {
00401                     /* input is texture from image, assign only one texid per
00402                      * buffer to avoid sampling the same texture twice */
00403                     if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(bindhash, input->ima)) {
00404                         input->texid = texid++;
00405                         input->bindtex = 1;
00406                         BLI_ghash_insert(bindhash, input->ima, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(input->texid));
00407                     }
00408                     else
00409                         input->texid = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(bindhash, input->ima));
00410                 }
00411                 else {
00412                     if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(bindhash, input->tex)) {
00413                         /* input is user created texture, check tex pointer */
00414                         input->texid = texid++;
00415                         input->bindtex = 1;
00416                         BLI_ghash_insert(bindhash, input->tex, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(input->texid));
00417                     }
00418                     else
00419                         input->texid = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(bindhash, input->tex));
00420                 }
00421 
00422                 /* make sure this pixel is defined exactly once */
00423                 if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX_PIXEL) {
00424                     if (input->ima) {
00425                         if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(definehash, input->ima)) {
00426                             input->definetex = 1;
00427                             BLI_ghash_insert(definehash, input->ima, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(input->texid));
00428                         }
00429                     }
00430                     else {
00431                         if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(definehash, input->link)) {
00432                             input->definetex = 1;
00433                             BLI_ghash_insert(definehash, input->link, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(input->texid));
00434                         }
00435                     }
00436                 }
00437             }
00438         }
00439 
00440         for (output=node->outputs.first; output; output=output->next)
00441             /* set id for unique names of tmp variables storing output */
00442             output->id = id++;
00443     }
00444 
00445     BLI_ghash_free(bindhash, NULL, NULL);
00446     BLI_ghash_free(definehash, NULL, NULL);
00447 }
00448 
00449 static void codegen_print_uniforms_functions(DynStr *ds, ListBase *nodes)
00450 {
00451     GPUNode *node;
00452     GPUInput *input;
00453     const char *name;
00454     int builtins = 0;
00455 
00456     /* print uniforms */
00457     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next) {
00458         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next) {
00459             if ((input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX) || (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX_PIXEL)) {
00460                 /* create exactly one sampler for each texture */
00461                 if (codegen_input_has_texture(input) && input->bindtex)
00462                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "uniform %s samp%d;\n",
00463                         (input->textype == GPU_TEX2D)? "sampler2D": "sampler2DShadow",
00464                         input->texid);
00465             }
00466             else if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_BUILTIN) {
00467                 /* only define each builting uniform/varying once */
00468                 if (!(builtins & input->builtin)) {
00469                     builtins |= input->builtin;
00470                     name = GPU_builtin_name(input->builtin);
00471 
00472                     if (gpu_str_prefix(name, "unf")) {
00473                         BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "uniform %s %s;\n",
00474                             GPU_DATATYPE_STR[input->type], name);
00475                     }
00476                     else {
00477                         BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "varying %s %s;\n",
00478                             GPU_DATATYPE_STR[input->type], name);
00479                     }
00480                 }
00481             }
00482             else if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_VEC_UNIFORM) {
00483                 if (input->dynamicvec) {
00484                     /* only create uniforms for dynamic vectors */
00485                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "uniform %s unf%d;\n",
00486                         GPU_DATATYPE_STR[input->type], input->id);
00487                 }
00488                 else {
00489                     /* for others use const so the compiler can do folding */
00490                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "const %s cons%d = ",
00491                         GPU_DATATYPE_STR[input->type], input->id);
00492                     codegen_print_datatype(ds, input->type, input->vec);
00493                     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ";\n");
00494                 }
00495             }
00496             else if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_ATTRIB && input->attribfirst) {
00497                 BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "varying %s var%d;\n",
00498                     GPU_DATATYPE_STR[input->type], input->attribid);
00499             }
00500         }
00501     }
00502 
00503     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "\n");
00504 }
00505 
00506 static void codegen_declare_tmps(DynStr *ds, ListBase *nodes)
00507 {
00508     GPUNode *node;
00509     GPUInput *input;
00510     GPUOutput *output;
00511 
00512     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next) {
00513         /* load pixels from textures */
00514         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next) {
00515             if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX_PIXEL) {
00516                 if (codegen_input_has_texture(input) && input->definetex) {
00517                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "\tvec4 tex%d = texture2D(", input->texid);
00518                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "samp%d, gl_TexCoord[%d].st);\n",
00519                         input->texid, input->texid);
00520                 }
00521             }
00522         }
00523 
00524         /* declare temporary variables for node output storage */
00525         for (output=node->outputs.first; output; output=output->next)
00526             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "\t%s tmp%d;\n",
00527                 GPU_DATATYPE_STR[output->type], output->id);
00528     }
00529 
00530     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "\n");
00531 }
00532 
00533 static void codegen_call_functions(DynStr *ds, ListBase *nodes, GPUOutput *finaloutput)
00534 {
00535     GPUNode *node;
00536     GPUInput *input;
00537     GPUOutput *output;
00538 
00539     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next) {
00540         BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "\t%s(", node->name);
00541         
00542         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next) {
00543             if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX) {
00544                 BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "samp%d", input->texid);
00545                 if (input->link)
00546                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, ", gl_TexCoord[%d].st", input->texid);
00547             }
00548             else if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_TEX_PIXEL) {
00549                 codegen_convert_datatype(ds, input->link->output->type, input->type,
00550                     "tmp", input->link->output->id);
00551             }
00552             else if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_BUILTIN)
00553                 BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "%s", GPU_builtin_name(input->builtin));
00554             else if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_VEC_UNIFORM) {
00555                 if (input->dynamicvec)
00556                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "unf%d", input->id);
00557                 else
00558                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "cons%d", input->id);
00559             }
00560             else if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_ATTRIB)
00561                 BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "var%d", input->attribid);
00562 
00563             BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ", ");
00564         }
00565 
00566         for (output=node->outputs.first; output; output=output->next) {
00567             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "tmp%d", output->id);
00568             if (output->next)
00569                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ", ");
00570         }
00571 
00572         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ");\n");
00573     }
00574 
00575     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "\n\tgl_FragColor = ");
00576     codegen_convert_datatype(ds, finaloutput->type, GPU_VEC4, "tmp", finaloutput->id);
00577     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ";\n");
00578 }
00579 
00580 static char *code_generate_fragment(ListBase *nodes, GPUOutput *output, const char *UNUSED(name))
00581 {
00582     DynStr *ds = BLI_dynstr_new();
00583     char *code;
00584 
00585     /*BLI_dynstr_append(ds, FUNCTION_PROTOTYPES);*/
00586 
00587     codegen_set_unique_ids(nodes);
00588     codegen_print_uniforms_functions(ds, nodes);
00589 
00590     //if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00591     //  BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "/* %s */\n", name);
00592 
00593     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "void main(void)\n");
00594     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "{\n");
00595 
00596     codegen_declare_tmps(ds, nodes);
00597     codegen_call_functions(ds, nodes, output);
00598 
00599     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "}\n");
00600 
00601     /* create shader */
00602     code = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(ds);
00603     BLI_dynstr_free(ds);
00604 
00605     //if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) printf("%s\n", code);
00606 
00607     return code;
00608 }
00609 
00610 static char *code_generate_vertex(ListBase *nodes)
00611 {
00612     DynStr *ds = BLI_dynstr_new();
00613     GPUNode *node;
00614     GPUInput *input;
00615     char *code;
00616     
00617     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next) {
00618         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next) {
00619             if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_ATTRIB && input->attribfirst) {
00620                 BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "attribute %s att%d;\n",
00621                     GPU_DATATYPE_STR[input->type], input->attribid);
00622                 BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "varying %s var%d;\n",
00623                     GPU_DATATYPE_STR[input->type], input->attribid);
00624             }
00625         }
00626     }
00627 
00628     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "\n");
00629     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, datatoc_gpu_shader_vertex_glsl);
00630 
00631     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next)
00632         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next)
00633             if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_ATTRIB && input->attribfirst) {
00634                 if (input->attribtype == CD_TANGENT) { /* silly exception */
00635                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "\tvar%d.xyz = normalize((gl_ModelViewMatrix * vec4(att%d.xyz, 0)).xyz);\n", input->attribid, input->attribid);
00636                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "\tvar%d.w = att%d.w;\n", input->attribid, input->attribid);
00637                 }
00638                 else
00639                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "\tvar%d = att%d;\n", input->attribid, input->attribid);
00640             }
00641 
00642     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "}\n\n");
00643 
00644     code = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(ds);
00645 
00646     BLI_dynstr_free(ds);
00647 
00648     //if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) printf("%s\n", code);
00649 
00650     return code;
00651 }
00652 
00653 int GPU_bicubic_bump_support(void)
00654 {
00655     return GLEW_ARB_texture_query_lod && GLEW_VERSION_3_0;
00656 }
00657 
00658 void GPU_code_generate_glsl_lib(void)
00659 {
00660     DynStr *ds;
00661 
00662     /* only initialize the library once */
00663     if (glsl_material_library)
00664         return;
00665 
00666     ds = BLI_dynstr_new();
00667 
00668     if (GPU_bicubic_bump_support()) {
00669         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "/* These are needed for high quality bump mapping */\n"
00670                 "#version 130\n"
00671                 "#extension GL_ARB_texture_query_lod: enable\n"
00672                 "#define BUMP_BICUBIC\n");
00673     }
00674     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, datatoc_gpu_shader_material_glsl);
00675 
00676 
00677     glsl_material_library = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(ds);
00678 
00679     BLI_dynstr_free(ds);
00680 }
00681 
00682 
00683 /* GPU pass binding/unbinding */
00684 
00685 GPUShader *GPU_pass_shader(GPUPass *pass)
00686 {
00687     return pass->shader;
00688 }
00689 
00690 static void GPU_nodes_extract_dynamic_inputs(GPUPass *pass, ListBase *nodes)
00691 {
00692     GPUShader *shader = pass->shader;
00693     GPUNode *node;
00694     GPUInput *next, *input;
00695     ListBase *inputs = &pass->inputs;
00696     int extract, z;
00697 
00698     memset(inputs, 0, sizeof(*inputs));
00699 
00700     if (!shader)
00701         return;
00702 
00703     GPU_shader_bind(shader);
00704 
00705     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next) {
00706         z = 0;
00707         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=next, z++) {
00708             next = input->next;
00709 
00710             /* attributes don't need to be bound, they already have
00711              * an id that the drawing functions will use */
00712             if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_ATTRIB ||
00713                input->source == GPU_SOURCE_BUILTIN)
00714                 continue;
00715 
00716             if (input->ima || input->tex)
00717                 BLI_snprintf(input->shadername, sizeof(input->shadername), "samp%d", input->texid);
00718             else
00719                 BLI_snprintf(input->shadername, sizeof(input->shadername), "unf%d", input->id);
00720 
00721             /* pass non-dynamic uniforms to opengl */
00722             extract = 0;
00723 
00724             if (input->ima || input->tex) {
00725                 if (input->bindtex)
00726                     extract = 1;
00727             }
00728             else if (input->dynamicvec)
00729                 extract = 1;
00730 
00731             if (extract)
00732                 input->shaderloc = GPU_shader_get_uniform(shader, input->shadername);
00733 
00734             /* extract nodes */
00735             if (extract) {
00736                 BLI_remlink(&node->inputs, input);
00737                 BLI_addtail(inputs, input);
00738             }
00739         }
00740     }
00741 
00742     GPU_shader_unbind(shader);
00743 }
00744 
00745 void GPU_pass_bind(GPUPass *pass, double time, int mipmap)
00746 {
00747     GPUInput *input;
00748     GPUShader *shader = pass->shader;
00749     ListBase *inputs = &pass->inputs;
00750 
00751     if (!shader)
00752         return;
00753 
00754     GPU_shader_bind(shader);
00755 
00756     /* now bind the textures */
00757     for (input=inputs->first; input; input=input->next) {
00758         if (input->ima)
00759             input->tex = GPU_texture_from_blender(input->ima, input->iuser, time, mipmap);
00760 
00761         if (input->tex && input->bindtex) {
00762             GPU_texture_bind(input->tex, input->texid);
00763             GPU_shader_uniform_texture(shader, input->shaderloc, input->tex);
00764         }
00765     }
00766 }
00767 
00768 void GPU_pass_update_uniforms(GPUPass *pass)
00769 {
00770     GPUInput *input;
00771     GPUShader *shader = pass->shader;
00772     ListBase *inputs = &pass->inputs;
00773 
00774     if (!shader)
00775         return;
00776 
00777     /* pass dynamic inputs to opengl, others were removed */
00778     for (input=inputs->first; input; input=input->next)
00779         if (!(input->ima || input->tex))
00780             GPU_shader_uniform_vector(shader, input->shaderloc, input->type, 1,
00781                 input->dynamicvec);
00782 }
00783 
00784 void GPU_pass_unbind(GPUPass *pass)
00785 {
00786     GPUInput *input;
00787     GPUShader *shader = pass->shader;
00788     ListBase *inputs = &pass->inputs;
00789 
00790     if (!shader)
00791         return;
00792 
00793     for (input=inputs->first; input; input=input->next) {
00794         if (input->tex && input->bindtex)
00795             GPU_texture_unbind(input->tex);
00796 
00797         if (input->ima)
00798             input->tex = NULL;
00799     }
00800     
00801     GPU_shader_unbind(shader);
00802 }
00803 
00804 /* Node Link Functions */
00805 
00806 static GPUNodeLink *GPU_node_link_create(int type)
00807 {
00808     GPUNodeLink *link = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUNodeLink), "GPUNodeLink");
00809     link->type = type;
00810     link->users++;
00811 
00812     return link;
00813 }
00814 
00815 static void GPU_node_link_free(GPUNodeLink *link)
00816 {
00817     link->users--;
00818 
00819     if (link->users < 0)
00820         fprintf(stderr, "GPU_node_link_free: negative refcount\n");
00821     
00822     if (link->users == 0) {
00823         if (link->output)
00824             link->output->link = NULL;
00825         MEM_freeN(link);
00826     }
00827 }
00828 
00829 /* Node Functions */
00830 
00831 static GPUNode *GPU_node_begin(const char *name)
00832 {
00833     GPUNode *node = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUNode), "GPUNode");
00834 
00835     node->name= name;
00836 
00837     return node;
00838 }
00839 
00840 static void GPU_node_end(GPUNode *UNUSED(node))
00841 {
00842     /* empty */
00843 }
00844 
00845 static void gpu_node_input_link(GPUNode *node, GPUNodeLink *link, int type)
00846 {
00847     GPUInput *input;
00848     GPUNode *outnode;
00849     const char *name;
00850 
00851     if (link->output) {
00852         outnode = link->output->node;
00853         name = outnode->name;
00854 
00855         if (strcmp(name, "set_value")==0 || strcmp(name, "set_rgb")==0) {
00856             input = MEM_dupallocN(outnode->inputs.first);
00857             input->type = type;
00858             if (input->link)
00859                 input->link->users++;
00860             BLI_addtail(&node->inputs, input);
00861             return;
00862         }
00863     }
00864     
00865     input = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUInput), "GPUInput");
00866     input->node = node;
00867 
00868     if (link->builtin) {
00869         /* builtin uniform */
00870         input->type = type;
00871         input->source = GPU_SOURCE_BUILTIN;
00872         input->builtin = link->builtin;
00873 
00874         MEM_freeN(link);
00875     }
00876     else if (link->output) {
00877         /* link to a node output */
00878         input->type = type;
00879         input->source = GPU_SOURCE_TEX_PIXEL;
00880         input->link = link;
00881         link->users++;
00882     }
00883     else if (link->dynamictex) {
00884         /* dynamic texture, GPUTexture is updated/deleted externally */
00885         input->type = type;
00886         input->source = GPU_SOURCE_TEX;
00887 
00888         input->tex = link->dynamictex;
00889         input->textarget = GL_TEXTURE_2D;
00890         input->textype = type;
00891         input->dynamictex = 1;
00892         input->dynamicdata = link->ptr2;
00893         MEM_freeN(link);
00894     }
00895     else if (link->texture) {
00896         /* small texture created on the fly, like for colorbands */
00897         input->type = GPU_VEC4;
00898         input->source = GPU_SOURCE_TEX;
00899         input->textype = type;
00900 
00901         //input->tex = GPU_texture_create_2D(link->texturesize, link->texturesize, link->ptr2, NULL);
00902         input->tex = GPU_texture_create_2D(link->texturesize, 1, link->ptr1, NULL);
00903         input->textarget = GL_TEXTURE_2D;
00904 
00905         MEM_freeN(link->ptr1);
00906         MEM_freeN(link);
00907     }
00908     else if (link->image) {
00909         /* blender image */
00910         input->type = GPU_VEC4;
00911         input->source = GPU_SOURCE_TEX;
00912 
00913         input->ima = link->ptr1;
00914         input->iuser = link->ptr2;
00915         input->textarget = GL_TEXTURE_2D;
00916         input->textype = GPU_TEX2D;
00917         MEM_freeN(link);
00918     }
00919     else if (link->attribtype) {
00920         /* vertex attribute */
00921         input->type = type;
00922         input->source = GPU_SOURCE_ATTRIB;
00923 
00924         input->attribtype = link->attribtype;
00925         BLI_strncpy(input->attribname, link->attribname, sizeof(input->attribname));
00926         MEM_freeN(link);
00927     }
00928     else {
00929         /* uniform vector */
00930         input->type = type;
00931         input->source = GPU_SOURCE_VEC_UNIFORM;
00932 
00933         memcpy(input->vec, link->ptr1, type*sizeof(float));
00934         if (link->dynamic) {
00935             input->dynamicvec= link->ptr1;
00936             input->dynamictype= link->dynamictype;
00937             input->dynamicdata= link->ptr2;
00938         }
00939         MEM_freeN(link);
00940     }
00941 
00942     BLI_addtail(&node->inputs, input);
00943 }
00944 
00945 static void gpu_node_input_socket(GPUNode *node, GPUNodeStack *sock)
00946 {
00947     GPUNodeLink *link;
00948 
00949     if (sock->link) {
00950         gpu_node_input_link(node, sock->link, sock->type);
00951     }
00952     else {
00953         link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
00954         link->ptr1 = sock->vec;
00955         gpu_node_input_link(node, link, sock->type);
00956     }
00957 }
00958 
00959 static void GPU_node_output(GPUNode *node, int type, const char *UNUSED(name), GPUNodeLink **link)
00960 {
00961     GPUOutput *output = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUOutput), "GPUOutput");
00962 
00963     output->type = type;
00964     output->node = node;
00965 
00966     if (link) {
00967         *link = output->link = GPU_node_link_create(type);
00968         output->link->output = output;
00969 
00970         /* note: the caller owns the reference to the linkfer, GPUOutput
00971          * merely points to it, and if the node is destroyed it will
00972          * set that pointer to NULL */
00973     }
00974 
00975     BLI_addtail(&node->outputs, output);
00976 }
00977 
00978 static void GPU_inputs_free(ListBase *inputs)
00979 {
00980     GPUInput *input;
00981 
00982     for (input=inputs->first; input; input=input->next) {
00983         if (input->link)
00984             GPU_node_link_free(input->link);
00985         else if (input->tex && !input->dynamictex)
00986             GPU_texture_free(input->tex);
00987     }
00988 
00989     BLI_freelistN(inputs);
00990 }
00991 
00992 static void GPU_node_free(GPUNode *node)
00993 {
00994     GPUOutput *output;
00995 
00996     GPU_inputs_free(&node->inputs);
00997 
00998     for (output=node->outputs.first; output; output=output->next)
00999         if (output->link) {
01000             output->link->output = NULL;
01001             GPU_node_link_free(output->link);
01002         }
01003 
01004     BLI_freelistN(&node->outputs);
01005     MEM_freeN(node);
01006 }
01007 
01008 static void GPU_nodes_free(ListBase *nodes)
01009 {
01010     GPUNode *node;
01011 
01012     while (nodes->first) {
01013         node = nodes->first;
01014         BLI_remlink(nodes, node);
01015         GPU_node_free(node);
01016     }
01017 }
01018 
01019 /* vertex attributes */
01020 
01021 static void gpu_nodes_get_vertex_attributes(ListBase *nodes, GPUVertexAttribs *attribs)
01022 {
01023     GPUNode *node;
01024     GPUInput *input;
01025     int a;
01026 
01027     /* convert attributes requested by node inputs to an array of layers,
01028      * checking for duplicates and assigning id's starting from zero. */
01029 
01030     memset(attribs, 0, sizeof(*attribs));
01031 
01032     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next) {
01033         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next) {
01034             if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_ATTRIB) {
01035                 for (a=0; a<attribs->totlayer; a++) {
01036                     if (attribs->layer[a].type == input->attribtype &&
01037                         strcmp(attribs->layer[a].name, input->attribname) == 0)
01038                         break;
01039                 }
01040 
01041                 if (a == attribs->totlayer && a < GPU_MAX_ATTRIB) {
01042                     input->attribid = attribs->totlayer++;
01043                     input->attribfirst = 1;
01044 
01045                     attribs->layer[a].type = input->attribtype;
01046                     attribs->layer[a].attribid = input->attribid;
01047                     BLI_strncpy(attribs->layer[a].name, input->attribname,
01048                         sizeof(attribs->layer[a].name));
01049                 }
01050                 else
01051                     input->attribid = attribs->layer[a].attribid;
01052             }
01053         }
01054     }
01055 }
01056 
01057 static void gpu_nodes_get_builtin_flag(ListBase *nodes, int *builtin)
01058 {
01059     GPUNode *node;
01060     GPUInput *input;
01061     
01062     *builtin= 0;
01063 
01064     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next)
01065         for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next)
01066             if (input->source == GPU_SOURCE_BUILTIN)
01067                 *builtin |= input->builtin;
01068 }
01069 
01070 /* varargs linking  */
01071 
01072 GPUNodeLink *GPU_attribute(int type, const char *name)
01073 {
01074     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01075 
01076     link->attribtype= type;
01077     link->attribname= name;
01078 
01079     return link;
01080 }
01081 
01082 GPUNodeLink *GPU_uniform(float *num)
01083 {
01084     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01085 
01086     link->ptr1= num;
01087     link->ptr2= NULL;
01088 
01089     return link;
01090 }
01091 
01092 GPUNodeLink *GPU_dynamic_uniform(float *num, int dynamictype, void *data)
01093 {
01094     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01095 
01096     link->ptr1= num;
01097     link->ptr2= data;
01098     link->dynamic= 1;
01099     link->dynamictype = dynamictype;
01100 
01101 
01102     return link;
01103 }
01104 
01105 GPUNodeLink *GPU_image(Image *ima, ImageUser *iuser)
01106 {
01107     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01108 
01109     link->image= 1;
01110     link->ptr1= ima;
01111     link->ptr2= iuser;
01112 
01113     return link;
01114 }
01115 
01116 GPUNodeLink *GPU_texture(int size, float *pixels)
01117 {
01118     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01119 
01120     link->texture = 1;
01121     link->texturesize = size;
01122     link->ptr1= pixels;
01123 
01124     return link;
01125 }
01126 
01127 GPUNodeLink *GPU_dynamic_texture(GPUTexture *tex, int dynamictype, void *data)
01128 {
01129     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01130 
01131     link->dynamic = 1;
01132     link->dynamictex = tex;
01133     link->dynamictype = dynamictype;
01134     link->ptr2 = data;
01135 
01136     return link;
01137 }
01138 
01139 GPUNodeLink *GPU_socket(GPUNodeStack *sock)
01140 {
01141     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01142 
01143     link->socket= sock;
01144 
01145     return link;
01146 }
01147 
01148 GPUNodeLink *GPU_builtin(GPUBuiltin builtin)
01149 {
01150     GPUNodeLink *link = GPU_node_link_create(0);
01151 
01152     link->builtin= builtin;
01153 
01154     return link;
01155 }
01156 
01157 int GPU_link(GPUMaterial *mat, const char *name, ...)
01158 {
01159     GPUNode *node;
01160     GPUFunction *function;
01161     GPUNodeLink *link, **linkptr;
01162     va_list params;
01163     int i;
01164 
01165     function = GPU_lookup_function(name);
01166     if (!function) {
01167         fprintf(stderr, "GPU failed to find function %s\n", name);
01168         return 0;
01169     }
01170 
01171     node = GPU_node_begin(name);
01172 
01173     va_start(params, name);
01174     for (i=0; i<function->totparam; i++) {
01175         if (function->paramqual[i] != FUNCTION_QUAL_IN) {
01176             linkptr= va_arg(params, GPUNodeLink**);
01177             GPU_node_output(node, function->paramtype[i], "", linkptr);
01178         }
01179         else {
01180             link= va_arg(params, GPUNodeLink*);
01181             gpu_node_input_link(node, link, function->paramtype[i]);
01182         }
01183     }
01184     va_end(params);
01185 
01186     GPU_node_end(node);
01187 
01188     gpu_material_add_node(mat, node);
01189 
01190     return 1;
01191 }
01192 
01193 int GPU_stack_link(GPUMaterial *mat, const char *name, GPUNodeStack *in, GPUNodeStack *out, ...)
01194 {
01195     GPUNode *node;
01196     GPUFunction *function;
01197     GPUNodeLink *link, **linkptr;
01198     va_list params;
01199     int i, totin, totout;
01200 
01201     function = GPU_lookup_function(name);
01202     if (!function) {
01203         fprintf(stderr, "GPU failed to find function %s\n", name);
01204         return 0;
01205     }
01206 
01207     node = GPU_node_begin(name);
01208     totin = 0;
01209     totout = 0;
01210 
01211     if (in) {
01212         for (i = 0; in[i].type != GPU_NONE; i++) {
01213             gpu_node_input_socket(node, &in[i]);
01214             totin++;
01215         }
01216     }
01217     
01218     if (out) {
01219         for (i = 0; out[i].type != GPU_NONE; i++) {
01220             GPU_node_output(node, out[i].type, out[i].name, &out[i].link);
01221             totout++;
01222         }
01223     }
01224 
01225     va_start(params, out);
01226     for (i=0; i<function->totparam; i++) {
01227         if (function->paramqual[i] != FUNCTION_QUAL_IN) {
01228             if (totout == 0) {
01229                 linkptr= va_arg(params, GPUNodeLink**);
01230                 GPU_node_output(node, function->paramtype[i], "", linkptr);
01231             }
01232             else
01233                 totout--;
01234         }
01235         else {
01236             if (totin == 0) {
01237                 link= va_arg(params, GPUNodeLink*);
01238                 if (link->socket)
01239                     gpu_node_input_socket(node, link->socket);
01240                 else
01241                     gpu_node_input_link(node, link, function->paramtype[i]);
01242             }
01243             else
01244                 totin--;
01245         }
01246     }
01247     va_end(params);
01248 
01249     GPU_node_end(node);
01250 
01251     gpu_material_add_node(mat, node);
01252     
01253     return 1;
01254 }
01255 
01256 int GPU_link_changed(GPUNodeLink *link)
01257 {
01258     GPUNode *node;
01259     GPUInput *input;
01260     const char *name;
01261 
01262     if (link->output) {
01263         node = link->output->node;
01264         name = node->name;
01265 
01266         if (strcmp(name, "set_value")==0 || strcmp(name, "set_rgb")==0) {
01267             input = node->inputs.first;
01268             return (input->link != NULL);
01269         }
01270 
01271         return 1;
01272     }
01273     else
01274         return 0;
01275 }
01276 
01277 /* Pass create/free */
01278 
01279 static void gpu_nodes_tag(GPUNodeLink *link)
01280 {
01281     GPUNode *node;
01282     GPUInput *input;
01283 
01284     if (!link->output)
01285         return;
01286 
01287     node = link->output->node;
01288     if (node->tag)
01289         return;
01290     
01291     node->tag= 1;
01292     for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next)
01293         if (input->link)
01294             gpu_nodes_tag(input->link);
01295 }
01296 
01297 static void gpu_nodes_prune(ListBase *nodes, GPUNodeLink *outlink)
01298 {
01299     GPUNode *node, *next;
01300 
01301     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=node->next)
01302         node->tag= 0;
01303 
01304     gpu_nodes_tag(outlink);
01305 
01306     for (node=nodes->first; node; node=next) {
01307         next = node->next;
01308 
01309         if (!node->tag) {
01310             BLI_remlink(nodes, node);
01311             GPU_node_free(node);
01312         }
01313     }
01314 }
01315 
01316 GPUPass *GPU_generate_pass(ListBase *nodes, GPUNodeLink *outlink, GPUVertexAttribs *attribs, int *builtins, const char *name)
01317 {
01318     GPUShader *shader;
01319     GPUPass *pass;
01320     char *vertexcode, *fragmentcode;
01321 
01322     /*if (!FUNCTION_LIB) {
01323         GPU_nodes_free(nodes);
01324         return NULL;
01325     }*/
01326 
01327     /* prune unused nodes */
01328     gpu_nodes_prune(nodes, outlink);
01329 
01330     gpu_nodes_get_vertex_attributes(nodes, attribs);
01331     gpu_nodes_get_builtin_flag(nodes, builtins);
01332 
01333     /* generate code and compile with opengl */
01334     fragmentcode = code_generate_fragment(nodes, outlink->output, name);
01335     vertexcode = code_generate_vertex(nodes);
01336     shader = GPU_shader_create(vertexcode, fragmentcode, glsl_material_library); /*FUNCTION_LIB);*/
01337 
01338     /* failed? */
01339     if (!shader) {
01340         memset(attribs, 0, sizeof(*attribs));
01341         memset(builtins, 0, sizeof(*builtins));
01342         GPU_nodes_free(nodes);
01343         return NULL;
01344     }
01345     
01346     /* create pass */
01347     pass = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUPass), "GPUPass");
01348 
01349     pass->output = outlink->output;
01350     pass->shader = shader;
01351     pass->fragmentcode = fragmentcode;
01352     pass->vertexcode = vertexcode;
01353     pass->libcode = glsl_material_library;
01354 
01355     /* extract dynamic inputs and throw away nodes */
01356     GPU_nodes_extract_dynamic_inputs(pass, nodes);
01357     GPU_nodes_free(nodes);
01358 
01359     return pass;
01360 }
01361 
01362 void GPU_pass_free(GPUPass *pass)
01363 {
01364     GPU_shader_free(pass->shader);
01365     GPU_inputs_free(&pass->inputs);
01366     if (pass->fragmentcode)
01367         MEM_freeN(pass->fragmentcode);
01368     if (pass->vertexcode)
01369         MEM_freeN(pass->vertexcode);
01370     MEM_freeN(pass);
01371 }
